summary: I JUST WANT TO SAY TO INFINITI WHY THEY DIDN'T KEEP ON BUILDING THIS CAR! I MEAN MINE HAS 111,111 AND IT STILLS RUNS LIKE NEW NO PROBLEM AT ALL! I HAVE THE INFINITI QX4 2001 GOLD PEARL 4X4 NAVIGATION SYSTEM 6 DIS CD CHANGER IN THE BACK OF THE CAR NOT THE ONE IN THE DASH AND THIS CAR STILL PERFORMS LIKE WHEN IT WAS TAKEN OUT OF THE DEALER IN 2001.I WOULD LIKE TO NOW WHY THEY DISCONTINUED THE PRODUCTION AND JUST TO SAY THE HOW MANY MORE RX300 LEXUS IS GOING TO KEEP SELLING BEFORE INFINITI COMES BACK WHICH A COMPETITION! INFINITI BRING BACK QX4 NOW! *TR
